query.description: Query to filter the results. Check filters.
query.title: Query

ftpsiteurl.description: URL for the account’s FTP site to enable users to access data and share documents
ftpsiteurl.title: FTP site URL

description.description: Additional information to describe the account, such as an excerpt from the company’s website
description.title: Description

industrycode.description: The account’s primary industry for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
industrycode.title: Industry Name or ID

addresstypecode.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
addresstypecode.title: Address Type Name or ID

websiteurl.description: The account’s website URL to get quick details about the company profile
websiteurl.title: Website URL

paymenttermscode.description: The payment terms to indicate when the customer needs to pay the total amount. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
paymenttermscode.title: Payment Terms Name or ID

emailaddress1.description: The primary email address for the account
emailaddress1.title: Email Address 1

preferredappointmentdaycode.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
preferredappointmentdaycode.title: Preferred Appointment Day Name or ID
preferredappointmentdaycode.displayName: Preferred Appointment Day Name or ID

preferredcontactmethodcode.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
preferredcontactmethodcode.title: Preferred Contact Method Name or ID
preferredcontactmethodcode.displayName: Preferred Contact Method Name or ID

telephone3.description: The third phone number for this account
telephone3.title: Telephone 3

telephone2.description: The second phone number for this account
telephone2.title: Telephone 2

customersizecode.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
customersizecode.title: Customer Size Name or ID

shippingmethodcode.description: Shipping method for deliveries sent to the account’s address to designate the preferred carrier or other delivery option. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
shippingmethodcode.title: Shipping Method Name or ID

businesstypecode.description: The legal designation or other business type of the account for contracts or reporting purposes. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
businesstypecode.title: Business Type Name or ID

emailaddress3.description: Alternate email address for the account
emailaddress3.title: Email Address 3

accountratingcode.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
accountratingcode.title: Account Rating Name or ID

preferredappointmenttimecode.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
preferredappointmenttimecode.title: Preferred Appointment Time Name or ID
preferredappointmenttimecode.displayName: Preferred Appointment Time Name or ID

creditlimit.description: Credit limit of the account. This is a useful reference when you address invoice and accounting issues with the customer.
creditlimit.title: Credit Limit

revenue.description: The annual revenue for the account, used as an indicator in financial performance analysis
revenue.title: Revenue

stockexchange.description: The stock exchange at which the account is listed to track their stock and financial performance of the company
stockexchange.title: Stock Exchange

tickersymbol.description: Type the stock exchange symbol for the account to track financial performance of the company. You can click the code entered in this field to access the latest trading information from MSN Money.
tickersymbol.title: Ticker Symbol

sic.description: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code that indicates the account’s primary industry of business, for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis
sic.title: SIC

emailaddress2.description: The secondary email address for the account
emailaddress2.title: Email Address 2

customertypecode.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
customertypecode.title: Customer Type Name or ID

accountcategorycode.description: Category to indicate whether the customer account is standard or preferred. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
accountcategorycode.title: Account Category Name or ID

yominame.description: The phonetic spelling of the company name, if specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls and other communications
yominame.title: Yomi Name

numberofemployees.description: Number of employees that work at the account for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis
numberofemployees.title: Number Of Employees

territorycode.description: Region or territory for the account for use in segmentation and analysis. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
territorycode.title: Territory Name or ID

telephone1.description: The main phone number for this account
telephone1.title: Telephone 1

sharesoutstanding.description: The number of shares available to the public for the account. This number is used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.
sharesoutstanding.title: Shares Outstanding
